summary: Louis Napoleon III takes advantage of the American Civil War to circumvent the Monroe Doctrine and expand his power by helping Emperor Maximillian Hapsburg to add Mexico to his empire.

keywords: 19th century|napoleon iii|maximilian i of mexico|french occupied mexico|french empire
title: Juárez
